ygData.subject: Shodow Star's fall
ygData.msgSnippet: SS crashes and goes into a head first roll in front of the Chivatron base.  He opens his com unit. SS:  SHIVAH!  SHIVAH! IF YOU CAN HEAR ME HELP!  I NEED HELP!

SS crashes and goes into a head first roll in front of the Chivatron 
base.  He opens his com unit.

SS:  SHIVAH!  SHIVAH! IF YOU CAN HEAR ME HELP!  I NEED HELP!  PRONTO 
UNDELY! UNDELY! AREBA!  COMEON QUICK!

He fades to simiconciousness and the link dies.

SS:  Internal repairs.

They start, but it's doubtful he will survive out of the CR chamber.
